participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys outdoor activities and social gatherings.
participant_1.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Alice
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for baking and crafting.
participant_2.background: knitting is my passion. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
